name: Dragon Wife
description:
When you first think about knights and dragons, your first thought is probably that knights kill dragons and then there is a happily ever after. What happens when the knight puts down her kingdom's shield, marries the dragon and the adventure has just only begun? Find out in Dragon Wife, a Ren.Py-made visual novel about a knight and her dragon wife after they move into their new home and have to convince their neighbors to accept them.

Currently a demo. There is more to come!

Feature list for eventual full game:

- A dragon that is your wife!

- 7 characters, 6 neighbors to convince

- A village with magical technology to explore

- Multiple endings

- LGBT+ themes

We also have a website, a twitter and a tumblr!
